synopsis.text: The lively raccoon, Rascal, resides in the hidden gem known as Snag Forest, where he shares his days with a delightful cast of woodland pals. Despite occasionally finding himself in hot water with his mother due to his mischievous antics, Rascal's charming and affable nature consistently wins over the hearts of his fellow forest dwellers. Join Rascal and his jovial companions, including the adorable raccoon girl Rilulu, the music-loving skunk Rock'n, and the nut-munching mouse Iggy, as they embark on their daily escapades in this heartwarming pre-school animation series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
